content: **\#spicierlifecal** a spicier life blanket pattern was originally released in parts for the cherry heart and black sheep wools cal in the autumn of 2017 > now available as a pdf with bonus > content a spicier life bonus edition 1 this is the second of the spicy cal blankets to find the first blanket see the spice of life 2 **skill level** *easy/intermediate* this pattern is intended to help someone who has learnt the basics of crochet and is now looking to move on and increase their crochet confidence this pattern starts out simple and progresses through to intermediate stitches and combinations includes helpful photos and tips to guide you through each section and video tutorials for new stitches *skills needed* follow a basic written crochet pattern using abbreviations work back and forth in row and change colours work basic stitches eg double_crochet half_double_crochet treble_crochet dtr it would also be helpful to know how to work decreases eg tr2tog tr3tog **yarn** available in a choice of three different packs available from black sheep wools 3 *jaipur* 14 balls of stylecraft special dk 1 ball each cream 1005 midnight 1011 walnut 1054 grape 1067 pale rose 1080 shrimp 1132 camel 1420 petrol 1708 stone 1710 tomato 1723 duck egg 1820 pistachio 1822 cypress 1824 mushroom 1832 *taj mahal* 14 balls of stylecraft special dk 1 ball each dark brown 1004 apricot 1026 copper 1029 sherbet 1034 mocha 1064 saffron 1081 parchment 1218 soft peach 1240 petrol 1708 gold 1709 storm blue 1722 parma violet 1724 buttermilk 1835 vintage peach 1836 *bollywood* 14 balls of stylecraft special dk 1 ball each plum 1061 bluebell 1082 magenta 1084 candy floss 1130 fondant 1241 violet 1277 clematis 1390 emperor 1425 wisteria 1432 gold 1709 mustard 1823 lobelia 1825 fuchsia purple 1827 buttermilk 1835 **free pattern includes ** - a full written pattern with clear instructions in uk or us terms - links to a spicier life page for original blog post tips - links to helpful videos see a spicier life bonus edition 1 for the full pdf version with more help pictures and bonus content **pattern written in** uk terms us terms translated **cherry heart s cozy corner** please come and join the cherry heart group 5 watch podcasts join crochet/knit alongs share your projects and enjoy yarny chit chat i love to see your projects… #aspicierlifeblanket #cherryheart **translations** dutch -
